# portkey_usage_limits_policies (Data Source)

Use this data source to get a list of Portkey usage limits policies.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `workspace_id` (String) Workspace ID to filter policies.

### Read-Only

- `policies` (Attributes List) List of usage limits policies. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--policies))

<a id="nestedatt--policies"></a>
### Nested Schema for `policies`

Read-Only:

- `alert_threshold` (Number) Alert threshold.
- `conditions` (String) JSON array of conditions.
- `created_at` (String) Timestamp when the policy was created.
- `credit_limit` (Number) Maximum usage allowed.
- `group_by` (String) JSON array of group by fields.
- `id` (String) Policy identifier (UUID).
- `name` (String) Human-readable name for the policy.
- `periodic_reset` (String) Reset period.
- `status` (String) Status of the policy (active, archived).
- `type` (String) Policy type: 'cost' or 'tokens'.
- `updated_at` (String) Timestamp when the policy was last updated.
- `workspace_id` (String) Workspace ID the policy belongs to.
